title: Australian weekend
creator_credit: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Rhonda Small
brief_description: Indicates some of the ways in which Australians find recreation in their weekends. The people of Sydney go surfing, yachting, hiking, fishing, or playing cricket, bowls or golf during the day, and dance on the foreshores of the harbour at night. Music but no commentary.
creator_credit_for_label: Australian Commonwealth Film Unit and Rhonda Small
